channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: A large manhole cover in bus lane, 18th November
item.description:
Bus lane in constant use and every time a bus goes over the loose manhole cover it makes a very loud noise. Not to mention the potential issue if it finally breaks. I have notified Lambeth Council in August and again in October and nothing been done
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 100, Westminster Bridge Road, Waterloo, London Borough of Lambeth
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Still disgusting!, 18th November
item.description:
24h later and no improvement. Why haven’t the commercial waste bags been collected? Why is it still a shithole??

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Pellerin Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pot hole on colney hatch lane N11 at N circ junction, 18th November
item.description:
Deep wide pothole at least 12 inches wide and 6 inches deep, square hole needs urgent repair. Junction of Colney Hatch Lane and Orion Road, towards Muswell Hill. Dangerous for traffic swerving to avoid hole.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Colney Hatch Lane, Colney Hatch, East Finchley, London Borough of Barnet
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish along pavement and road, 18th November
item.description:
There is rubbish which looks like netting on the pavement as well as other rubbish in the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): White Hart Road, Goddington, Orpington, London Borough of Bromley

item.title: Empty Tree Pit opp 22 Princes Road, 18th November
item.description:
This tree pit has been empty for over 6 years and last year a stake was put in but a tree never appeared, possibly due to the close proxinity of adjacent trees. If a tree is not to be planted our residents association has an active gardening team and would be happy to use this pit for planting flowering plants and to maintain it to brighten the location up.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Princes Road, Penge, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaf Clearence, 18th November
item.description:
